#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
int main() {
	ll i,t,x,y,ans,sum=2;
	vector<ll> fib(1001),st(1001);
	fib[1]=1;
	fib[2]=2;
	sum=2;
	st[1]=st[2]=1;
	for(i=3;i<=1000;i++)
	{
		
		st[i]=(st[i-1]+st[i-2])%mod;
		sum=(sum+st[i])%mod;
		fib[i]=sum;
	}
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y);
		if(x==0)
		{
			ans=fib[y];
		}
		else
		{
			ans=(fib[y]-fib[x-1])%mod;
			if(ans<0)
				ans=(ans+mod)%mod;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
